title: Waiting Jackals
description: The world has ended.No, we don't have time for another scotch.The awaited second installment in the acclaimed GREY ZOMBIE SURVIVAL Series by Ian DG Sandusky.---THE WORLD ENGULFED IN FLAMESThe infection has spread. The era of civilization has come to a close. Those consumed by the blight rove the Ontario wasteland, hungry for the flesh of survivors.THE END TIMES ARE UPON USCarey Cardinal and Keila Tindall have escaped New Braniff with their lives, but at what price, and for how long - none can say. Following the retreat of the decimated Canadian Forces, they find themselves in one of the last vestiges of humanity - Forward-Base Alexander. Only two other battalions remain - Camp Robinson to the north, and the fabled C-SOR JACKALS.SURVIVING THE OUTBREAK WAS ONLY THE BEGINNINGThe winds of fate blow without heed, sending past friends, new opponents and faint hopes into their path, clouding the already hazed road ahead. A solitary thread, taut to the breaking point, links them to the ones they seek.Only one thing is Eventually, everyone dies.It's only a matter of how soon, and at which teeth.
author: Ian D.G. Sandusky
